title: Help switching Korean client language from Korean to English
body:
I have a Korean account and client and I tried changing the language by going to RADS/system into locale and changing it to en_US.
The language changed but every time I open the client when the locale is en_US it tries to update and fails and tells me to look in logs but when i change the locale back to Korean it works fine again. Can anyone help me with this?

replies.body:
If you change any of the game files, it will force the client to update in order to check for any corrupted files. Since you've modified the language, it begins to patch and corrects that language adjustment so that it matches the server you're playing on. 

Modifying league game files is not something we encourage, as doing so could cause even more corrupted files.

corrects that language adjustment so that it matches the server you're playing on. 

So is there any official way to play in English on non-English servers? (And if not, can you pass that request on to the right people?)

Each region has their own supported languages, here's a [**link**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) to our article that goes over all the regions available languages.

Lemme know if that helps out!
